snippet: With speculation that Glencore may bid up to $5 billion for the Canadian grain trader Viterra, analysts question whether now is the right time for a potential takeover.
abstract: With speculation that Glencore may bid up to $5 billion for the Canadian grain trader Viterra, analysts question whether now is the right time for a potential takeover.

headline.main: Glencore's Potential Bid for Viterra May Face Challenges
